title: Tranquilum
detail: Wearable tech to measure and reduce stress
extended_details: A wearable that will quantifiably monitor and measure paramters that help us determine stress levels the person is undergoing. The accompanying app will display this information and help the user reduce stress through the use of the wearable.

parts_and_costs.part: Heart Rate Educational Starter Pack with Polar Wireless Sensors ID: 10
FLORA - Wearable electronic platform: Arduino-compatible [v3] ID: 659
Adafruit HTU21D-F Temperature & Humidity Sensor Breakout Board ID: 189
